**July 2024**

Served as the head analyst and visualization specialist, using Tableau to craft each chart, plot, and graph post cleaning the data.

- Developed and designed a website with WordPress to present findings from the analysis of 174,000+ rows of data across 2 datasets
- These datasets contain various mental health metrics as well as geographical, socioeconomic, among other online player information

The website along with the different visualizations and findings can be viewed through this [link](https://cyber-psyche.humspace.ucla.edu/).
